an5.101:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, silava hoti, bahussuto hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti.
an5.101:2.1: Yam, bhikkhave, assaddhassa sarajjam hoti, saddhassa tam sarajjam na hoti.
an5.101:3.1: Yam, bhikkhave, dussilassa sarajjam hoti, silavato tam sarajjam na hoti.
an5.101:4.1: Yam, bhikkhave, appassutassa sarajjam hoti, bahussutassa tam sarajjam na hoti.
an5.101:5.1: Yam, bhikkhave, kusitassa sarajjam hoti, araddhaviriyassa tam sarajjam na hoti.
an5.101:6.1: Yam, bhikkhave, duppannassa sarajjam hoti, pannavato tam sarajjam na hoti.
an5.101:6.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca sekhavesarajjakarana dhamma”ti.
